title: Ikkyuu-san
opening_song: "Tonchin Kanchin Ikkyuu-san (とんちんかんちん一休さん)" by Young Fresh
ending_song: "Hahaue-sama (ははうえさま)" by Toshiko Fujita
sinopse: Ikkyu is a little boy training to be a monk at Ankokuji Temple. Known for being mischievous and a bit of a troublemaker, but also extremely smart, Ikkyu constantly thinks of new ways to outwit his frustrated teachers, helping others at the same time.
